channel.title: Life on Grad Student Problems
channel.description: Recent content in Life on Grad Student Problems

item.title: Why I Dance
item.description: I’ve recently been spending a lot of time thinking about what I want to do with my life. Turns out this is a really hard question. The biggest difficulty is probably trying to understand what it means to do something with your life. Right now I’m coming back from a dance meet-up with some old friends and new, a little tipsy and drinking some more, and a lot exhilarated from moving on the dance floor.
